Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD ...Attention to the skunks!
Reviews.Author: Antonio GONZALEZ "ANGONFER"
Reviews.Content: This product has been very useful in my biological research on mammals, birds and reptiles. It really helps me when I need to inspect a nest in a cavity of a tree or in a cave in the ground I can see what species are using the cavity, how many individuals there are and if it has eggs or young. The only mishap was when I put the sensor in a cavity in the ground where lived a skunk... Plop! -  I had to run and return at night to get my equipment. It is excellent and I recommend for this and other uses.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: rsalamun6147 "rsalamun6147"
Reviews.Content: works flawlessly. would recomended to anyone that needs an inspection scope for automotive work and exploration. great visability on screen.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "RunningGal"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband, & although he has not used it a lot yet, he absolutely loves all the features.  This is one of the best birthday gifts I've gotten for him.  The one odd thing we've found is that when we turn it on, it interferes with our computers' wireless internet access.

Reviews.Title: As advertised!
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described, great price shipped fast. This unit allows you to see and take photos with the optic camera display.  We bought mainly for the rf display units for a piece of gear we had.  Original rep of our gear wanted $500 per display.  For that price I purchased two of these units and got the hand held camera as a bonus.

Reviews.Title: It works OK for my purpose
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I bought this scope to see inside of some machine and worked OK.I wish It has more stronger macro type of camera or give us a choice.When you put scope into small space, distance is so short thus you want macro.

Reviews.Title: Great for those out of the way places in an attic.
Reviews.Author: ree127
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, but if you need to replace the snake be prepared to purchase a whole new unit or a much longer snake.

Reviews.Title: Great for finding out what's behind the wall.
Reviews.Author: Ricco Swave'
Reviews.Content: We use this all the time for work......excellent purchase. Looking to buy the  six foot extension in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Product is a good deal, but supplier BrainyDeal is another matter.
Reviews.Author: Helohead
Reviews.Content: This borescope/camera is a good deal for the price and was somewhat useful for the job for which it was purchased. The model number ordered was identified as "8802AL" in the operator's manual. The accessories for this model include a 90 degree viewing mirror, a magnet tip for retrieving magnetic objects, and a hook to retrieve small objects. The problem I had with the order, and the reason I could not rate the product at 5 stars, is the accessories shipped were meant to be mounted on borescope/camera model "8803AL" and the supplier was not very accommodating.I contacted this supplier, BrainyDeal, several times about the discrepancy, citing the operator's manual and providing photographs of the accessory configuration supplied with the order. Despite the photographic evidence, Brainydeal insisted the parts shipped were correct. The borescope was needed for an on-going aircraft wing and fuselage under-floor inspection so returning the tool was not an option. Unfortunately for me, I was unable to use the 90 degree mirror since its mounting was not compatible with the product provided and there was a real risk the mirror and other accessories would get dislodge in an inaccessible area. If I were somewhat sleazy, I could have used the borescope/camera for the job and returned it afterwards for a refund. Then I might not have written this product review.The borescope/camera is useful and worth the money, but think about supplier performance before you purchase from BrainyDeal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Louis Martinez
Reviews.Content: Before I purchased this inspection camera I bought the 'Mini 7mm USB Flexible Inspection Camera Microscope Borescope Endoscope' at $38. That mini-inspection camera is not user friendly, whereas this Wireless Recordable Inspection Camera ($150) is very user friendly, very portable.  The memory-chip means you can use many different devises to view results.

Reviews.Title: good unit
Reviews.Author: The Offshore Group c/o Leonard Ottosen
Reviews.Content: the unit is being used and performance is correct. not being used for sewer inspections, is more for monitoring interior of a part needing closer view

Reviews.Title: like this a lot
Reviews.Author: CHRIS ZEIDNER
Reviews.Content: easy to use.  display provides high quality video.  nice that display works wirelessly.  have used to look into walls and down drains.
